titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for collegiate housing and infrastructure grants.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
4/16/2015--Introduced. Collegiate Housing and Infrastructure Act of 2015
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow tax-exempt charitable or educational organizations to make collegiate housing and infrastructure improvement grants to certain tax-exempt social clubs (e.g., college fraternities and sororities) which apply such grants to their collegiate housing property.
